issues.title: Unused metadata fields
issues.description: The metadata dict includes page_type and participant fields. Verify these are actually consumed somewhere before adding similar fields in future.

issues.title: Misleading cursor parameter in theme methods
issues.description: _extract_theme() and _extract_all_themes() accept a SQLite cursor parameter but immediately ignore it and create a PostgreSQL connection instead. This is a misleading API.
issues.suggestion: Consider splitting CodaSearchAdapter into CodaPageAdapter (SQLite) and CodaThemeAdapter (PostgreSQL) in future refactoring.

notes: The PR fix itself is minimal and correct. Both issues identified are pre-existing technical debt, not introduced by this PR. The fix properly aligns SQL queries with actual database schema.
